CASINO_FREE_BET_ENABLED.NAME: Casino Free Bet Enabled
CASINO_FREE_BET_ENABLED.DESCRIPTION: Is the game enabled for Casino Free Bet Rewards

CASINO_FREE_BET.CASINO_FREE_BET_VALUE: Casino Free Bet Value In Pounds
CASINO_FREE_BET.CASINO_FREE_BET_VALUE_ENABLED_EXPLAIN: Game requires a value in Pounds to be assigned to the Casino Free Bet Reward e.g. 25 would indicate the Bonus Cash Reward is worth 25 Pounds
CASINO_FREE_BET.CASINO_FREE_BET_VALUE_MISSING: Please specify Casino Free Bet value in Pounds.
